headline.main: CHAPLAIN WRECKS LEGEND OF DEC.7; Captain William Maguire Says He Did Not Man Navy Gun in Pearl Harbor Battle

lead_paragraph: Captain William Maguire, veteran Catholic naval chaplain, to whom the creators of the song "Praise the Lord and Pass the Ammunition" had attributed that phrase, emphatically denied yesterday that he had "manned a gun" during the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor.
